data.text: I would not recommend this app for QR scanning. When you scan a code instead of popping up with the actual link it pops up with a link to scam websites. It's only if you look around the edge of your screen do you see the tiny subscript "ad" message. Do yourself a favor and get an app that if it does have ads, they aren't acting like the code you scanned

A little odd after it was installed. A page popped up to install a QR reader/scanner and I had just done that. I hit the back arrow and got another weird page. So I closed the app, found the icon and started over. A little problem in a dimly lit room but the app has a button to tune the light on. Moved the phone a little bit and it immediately came up with the URL. The original QR scanner worked sporadically and I had deleted it before installing this app. Great extras in this app.
data.replyText: Thank you for your feedbackü§ó! Apologies for the initial inconvenience. We're glad to hear that our app's built-in QR scanner worked well for you after the restart and in low-light conditions. We appreciate your support and welcome suggestions or issues at appswingstudio@gmail.com. Enjoy additional extra features!‚ù§Ô∏è

data.text: Downloaded this app to set up a TV. It even showed a set up page, as soon as I put in card info ( tv even said it would give a free trial but need card information on file) my bank account got hit with all kinds of random charges. Double checked to make sure I didn't accidently hit an ad and I hadn't. Lost money and had to have my bank account shut down due to this. Save your time, frustration and money and don't use it. It hacks your account and does all kinds of bogus charges!
data.replyText: We're deeply sorry for your experience. Our app doesn't engage in unauthorized transactions. Random charges could be unrelated or a potential phishing attack. If you've encountered such issues, immediately contact your bank and report to appswingstudio@gmail.com with details for further investigation. Your security is our priority.üíñüö®

data.text: Still dont work ! Definitely an uninstall. Even updates havent improved the functionality, Good luck developers, seems like this has been kind of a lemon for ya. Could be my devices or internet but ive tried a few times over a year or longer and if it works, it should be WAY easier to navigate. All it does is run the line back and forth thru the barcode scanner frame but wont scan no matter what. Could be doing it wrong ? If so please set me up with directions, and accept my most humble apology.
data.replyText: We genuinely apologize for the persistent issue.üíñ To troubleshoot, ensure your device's camera lens is clean and focused. Grant the app necessary camera permissions. If scanning issues persist, adjust camera settings like autofocus. Please email us at appswingstudio@gmail.com, providing your device model and OS version. üì±üîç

data.text: Undecided about this app. As soon as I installed and scanned I got a pop up asking for my credit card details. I thought I needed to establish identity for a "free " account. Found out I will get charged over $30 in 5 days. I don't think the ad is part of the app but it's a very deceptive way of getting people to subscribe to something else. If the developer dose not want to be "painted with the same brush" maybe they shouldn't allow these ads.

I've always wanted a QR code scanner and finally, I got a phone that could support a scanner. No where is $$ mentioned. I scanned my 1st, then a credit card is needed to know my "location". I'm supposed to see $00 on my credit card and I don't sign up for premium, there'd be no charge, for 5 days. Then if you don't cancel my credit card will be charged $9.95 trial and $30 monthly. What the... my head is spinning from all the conflicting statements in paragraph 1. I didn't I read on.I deleted app

This is the worst QR code scanner I've ever used. It doesn't work on automatic or manual mode, the app keeps switching from back camera to front camera and turns the light off. I'm trying to use this app on a brand new phone, so it's not the phone. Plus the Codes that I was trying to read are from Walmart and iPhone, which are well used codes; but this app would not read them. I'm deleting this app and going to another app.
data.replyText:
Hello Gargola,

For assistance with the code scanning problem, share images with our support team at appswingstudio@gmail.com.
Thank you for your understanding.

data.text: Finally a QR scanning app that is easy to use. I downloaded this for the purpose of scanning my pets QR name tags. This app works great because it captured the code while the tag was in motion, not perfectly lined up and slightly blurred. The flashlight option also added to the ease of use and speed of accuracy. The app grabbed the code and recorded it easily and quickly and makes a beep sound once it has successfully scanned the code. Not all QR scan apps are the same! This one is great!

data.text: Amazing-accurate, dependable, simple person interface. Can test more than one, tiny QR codes on the same time, displaying all outcomes without delay. Codes do not want to be centered. Small footprint. No ads. No hijacking (some other QR apps do this).

The app is great. It's so easy to scan the codes. One major advantage this app has compared to others is that it can scan the codes in the dark or at night too because it has flash wich can be turned on or turned off. Definitely recommend this app

I just press the icon and start scaning. The app usually pics up the barcode before I gave finished scanning. Quick, efficient, and fun!!

This is an amazing and excellent working application. I'm really impressed by this application very much.Much recommended. this app has no glitch at all. I use this app on daily basis and its really helpful. Lightning QR scanner is very useful and helpful app. It is mostly used all over the world. It is easy to use. I like this app. Through Lightning QR Code Scanner, we can scan the code of any product, it is a very well designed application, its graphics are awesome.

Wow, this is by far the best experience to learn Thai. I have been learning Thai since the pandemic started on my own, so I have experience with about a dozen apps, but this one is awesome. I just got it two days ago, and my Thai has increased tremendously. The feature of listening at the speed of 100 in increments of .025 up to 200 speed has already increased my listening skills a lot. I only regret not having this book any sooner.

data.text: I used this barcode scanner to pay a Texas highway toll. I logged in and was directed to a screen that said "Activate. " Long story short, I was charged $39.95 for digitalizze, a streaming service. They sent me a username and password using the same p/w I use for Texas Toll. The phone number took me to third party where I canceled the service . The website is a shell. There are is nothing available under the "Categories" tab. CC company will reverse the charge.

This app works great! Works on a visible so you don't need a fancy iPhone anymore to scan a qr code. You can just open the camera on your phone or go to the app to use. Scans very fast and you don't even need to be right on top of the qr! I'd recommend it.

Downloaded for the free trial, was asked for bank card information in the event I decided to keep it, or for future purchases, within no time, I received a charge for 39.99, I don't know who, where, or why I was charged for a free trial. The following week I was once again charged 39.99 under the same circumstances, don't know who, where, or why. Had to cancel my bank card, and am out 80 bucks, so much for a free trial, uninstalling app now, good luck if you try it

As soon as you try to sign in they ask for your card information (they say the app is free but that they need your card on file). When I entered it in, my bank thankfully sent me a text asking if I had tried to make a $40 purchase (I hadn't because it said it was free) and my bank also sent a link to the website trying to charge me money. It was definitely a bogus, scam website. Do not download and do not give them your card information. They are trying to scam people.
